titleStmt.title: England's universal distraction in the years 1643, 1644, 1645 left to the vvorld by a judicious and conscientious author for the use of his friends, children, and grand-children, when they come to years of discretion : and may be very useful for all men to read and practice in these distracted times.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
